original_text: Yes, if God takes hold of you to punish you, that will make you very afraid! He is the powerful God who lives for ever. 10: See Psalm 135:14. Yes, if God takes hold of you to punish you, that will make you very afraid! He is the powerful God who lives for ever. 10: See Psalm 135:14. Yes, if God takes hold of you to punish you, that will make you very afraid! He is the powerful God who lives for ever.
korean_text: 살아 계신 하나님의 손에 빠져 들어가는 것이 무서울진저

sentences.original_text: Yes, if God takes hold of you
that will make you very afraid!
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신을 매우 두렵게 만들 것입니다!
